Uses of Class
adept.io.CoNLLDocument

Packages that use CoNLLDocument
adept.io Provides I/O classes that handle reading/write files in different formats, including LDC Gigaword Corpus, ERE, CoNLL, email and plain text. 
 

Uses of CoNLLDocument in adept.io
 

Methods in adept.io that return CoNLLDocument
 CoNLLDocument Reader.readCoNLLFile(String path)
          Reads specified CONLL file into an CONLLDocument (Document object wrapper).
